awards.description:
DESCRIPTION:-	MAINTAIN ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND BUILD ADMINISTRATION CAPACITY
-	CONDUCT ENVIRONMENTAL OUTREACH AND EDUCATION
-	ADDRESS AIR QUALITY ISSUES IN THE COMMUNITY AND PREVENT CLIMATE CHANGE IMPACTS. ACTIVITIES:-	OVERSEE DAY TO DAY ACTIVITIES FOR THE  ENVIRONMENTAL OFFICE AND REPORT ON A QUARTERLY BASIS ACTIVITIES AND FINANCES ASSOCIATED WITH GAP GRANT
-	WORK WITH COMMUNITY TO DEVELOP A BETTER UNDERSTANDING OF ENVIRONMENTAL ISSUES EFFECTING THE TRIBE
-	ACCESS INDOOR AIR QUALITY OF HOUSEHOLDS WITHIN VILLAGE AND DEVELOP PREVENTIVE MANAGEMENT TO WILDFIRES TO DECREASE IMPACTS OF CLIMATE CHANGESUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:-	QUARTERLY PROGRAMMATIC AND FINANCIAL REPORTS THAT ARE CONCISE COMPLETED ON TIME 
-	ENVIRONMENTAL OUTREACH AND EDUCATION CLASSES FOR VILLAGE MEMBERS OF ALL AGES LEADING TO AN ENVIRONMENTALLY INFORMED COMMUNITY
-	ASSESSMENT OF INDOOR HOUSEHOLD AIR QUALITY WILL BE DELIVERED TO EPA.  CLIMATE CHANGE OBSERVATIONS AND ADAPTIVE FORESTRY MANAGEMENT TECHNIQUES WILL BE DOCUMENTED.
